DOC.brief_summary: This project test efficacy behavioral intervention reduce sexual risk HIV infection among African American Men Have Sex Men ( MSM ) .
DOC.brief_title: Project ICARE : Intervening Community Awareness , Respect , & Empowerment
DOC.criteria: Be 18 year age old ; Selfidentify African American Understand read English ; Live within Chicago area ; Report least two ( male female ) sex partner past three month , unprotected anal sex least one male sex partner past three month . Have diagnose HIV within past three month ( allow psychological behavioral adjustment follow initial HIV diagnosis ) ; Have specific plan move Chicago area within next nine month ; Report active injection drug use hormone steroid . Participated intervention video pilot phase study .
